title: Brownie Pudding
directions: Sift the flour, baking powder, salt, sugar and 2 tbsp of cocoa powder together.
Mix the milk, vanilla and melted butter together in a separate bowl.
Combine the two mixtures you just made and whisk together until smooth. Add the nuts. Pour into the prepared baking dish.
Mix the brown sugar and 1/4 cup of cocoa together. Mix well and ensure all clumps are gone. Pour it over the top of the prepared dish.
Gently and slowly pour the hot water over the entire batter. You are trying to keep it from disturbing the thicker batter layer under the brown sugar/cocoa you just put over the top.
Serve warm with vanilla ice cream!
